pkgmetadata.longdescription: Automatic Shift Detection using a Phylogenetic EM // Implementation of the automatic shift detection method for Brownian Motion (BM) or OrnsteinUhlenbeck (OU) models of trait evolution on phylogenies. Some tools to handle equivalent shifts configurations are also available. See Bastide et al. (2017) doi:10.1111/rssb.12206 and Bastide et al. (2018) doi:10.1093/sysbio/syy005.
